title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Brain-Computer Interface System
description:
This task aims to clearly define the scope, objectives, and functional/non-functional requirements for the development of a brain-computer interface system designed to enhance human cognitive abilities in real-time. The definition should cover the following aspects:
1. Functional Requirements (list specific user actions and system responses, include examples such as: user thinking 'move right' and the system translates this into a corresponding action on screen or device)
   - Include additional examples for various actions like user imagining an object and the system displaying it in 3D, user thinking of a mathematical problem and the system solving it on-screen.
2. Non-Functional Requirements (performance, security, scalability, usability, etc., also specify desired response times for different user actions, potential data privacy concerns, and the need for seamless integration with existing systems)
   - Provide specific performance benchmarks, such as latency under 100 milliseconds or ability to process data from multiple sources simultaneously.
3. Any project constraints or assumptions (for example, the system must be compatible with commonly used brain-computer interface hardware, the initial version will only support English language input)
   - Specify that the system should be compatible with major BCI hardware brands and that future versions may support additional languages based on user feedback.
4. Future Scope (explore potential advancements or extensions of the system in the future, such as integrating with AI models for predictive analysis, or developing a mobile app version)
   - Discuss the benefits of these extensions and the challenges they might pose.
The output will provide a solid foundation for the design, implementation, testing, and documentation phases of the project. However, I would suggest adding more details on the specific technologies to be used (neuroimaging techniques, signal processing algorithms) and the user experience design considerations (ease of use, intuitive interfaces, etc.).
Please note that the current task is focusing on defining the requirements rather than the actual design or implementation details.
The RFC is ready for the next state. Please update the 'rfc_state' field to 'APPROVED_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION'.

title: Research and Evaluate Existing Technologies
description: Conduct research on existing brain-computer interface technologies, signal processing techniques, and cognitive enhancement methods to identify potential solutions and their limitations.

title: Design System Architecture for AssistantAugmentationCognitif Project: Real-Time Cognitive Enhancement System
description: Detailed design of the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software components, data flow, and integration points for the real-time cognitive enhancement system. The design should aim for scalability, compatibility with existing technologies, and real-time responsiveness. This includes technical documents, diagrams, specifications, and feasibility studies to guide development. The design will be reviewed by the team before being implemented.

title: Develop Signal Processing and Cognitive Enhancement Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms for processing brain signals, interpreting cognitive states, and enhancing cognitive abilities in real-time.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for interacting with the system, visualizing cognitive data, and configuring enhancement settings.

title: Develop Data Storage and Management System
description: Design and implement a secure and scalable data storage and management system for storing and retrieving user data, cognitive data, and system configurations.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement robust security and privacy measures to protect user data, ensure system integrity, and comply with relevant regulations.

title: Integrate System Components
description: Integrate the various system components, including hardware, software, and user interface, ensuring seamless communication and data flow.
dependencies: Develop Signal Processing and Cognitive Enhancement Algorithms
Develop Data Storage and Management System

title: Develop Comprehensive Testing and Quality Assurance Plan for Assistant Augmentation Cognitif System
description: Create a comprehensive testing and quality assurance plan that covers functional, performance, usability, security, compatibility tests, and stress tests to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as intended. The plan should be designed with an emphasis on real-time cognitive enhancement capabilities and AI/ML integration. In addition, include strategies for continuous integration, automated testing, and monitoring to maintain high system reliability, performance, and scalability. Furthermore, consider edge cases, error handling, and accessibility aspects in the plan, and prioritize tests based on potential impact and risk.

title: Conduct System Testing and Validation
description: Perform thorough testing and validation of the system, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Develop Testing and Quality Assurance Plan

title: Prepare System for Deployment
description: Prepare the system for deployment, including packaging, configuration management, and documentation.

title: Deploy and Monitor System
description: Deploy the system in the production environment, monitor its performance, and implement necessary updates and maintenance procedures.

title: Develop User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop comprehensive user documentation and training materials to ensure users can effectively utilize the system and its features.
